# Gene Howard

Gene Howard (born December 22, 1946) is an American former professional football cornerback in the National Football League (NFL). He was selected by the New Orleans Saints in the seventh round of the 1968 NFL/AFL draft. He played college football at Langston University.
Howard also played for the Los Angeles Rams.
